thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Splendid indeed !!!
thread.title_full: Splendid indeed !!! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 911KG911
title: Splendid indeed !!!
text:
Absolute luxury & comfort with unique views of the Arc & Eiffel Tower and only steps from the Champs.
Stay in room 606 if the euro's don't quite matter. The rooms are large & 606 has an expansive lounge with a good fold down divan. Views are to die for. The front staff are extremely friendly & efficient, nothing is of any trouble. There's lots to see even at this end of town & the bus network is second to none.
Splendid Etoile is very highly recommended & a great place to finish off your France trip before boarding your flight home.
Room Tip: Try 606 for views & sheer luxury See more room tips
